short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to make Adding Tracks to albums accessible on Genius.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides some accessibility features for adding new track numbers and editing existing track numbers for Genius.com as a contributor or editor.
